attributes.action: Improve London Road in Blewbury by fixing potholes/resurfacing the road entirely
attributes.additional_details:
London Road is constantly in need of repair from on going pothole issues. Repairs for cars are costly and many cannot afford to repair damaged tires. 

We would like the Government to put pressure on Oxfordshire County Council to refill the current potholes and consider resurfacing the road entirely.
attributes.background: I want the Oxfordshire county council to fix the roads in Blewbury to reduce costly damages to cars and vehicles that drive over the potholes as well as make the roads safer and nicer-looking. If the potholes cannot be repaired, the council should consider resurfacing the whole road.
